languages.text: {n}Друкари молчит, на его впалых щеках играют желваки. Наконец, он неохотно выговаривает.{/n} "Мне нужно время".

traits.locale_text: {n}Друкари молчит, на его впалых щеках играют желваки. Наконец, он начинает говорить.{/n} "Я приму решение наедине. Возвращайтесь на корабли".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}The Drukhari stays silent. You see the jaw muscles working in his hollow cheeks. Finally, he speaks with reluctance:{/n} "I need time."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари молчит, на его впалых щеках играют желваки. Наконец, он неохотно выговаривает.{/n} "Мне нужно время".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael stays silent, jowls bulging on his sunken cheeks. Finally, he speaks with reluctance.{/n} "I need time."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari stays silent. You see the jaw muscles working in his hollow cheeks. Finally, he speaks with reluctance:{/n} "I need time."

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari schweigt. Du siehst, wie die Kaumuskeln in seinen leeren Wangen arbeiten. Schließlich spricht er zögerlich:{/n} "Ich brauche Zeit."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari stays silent. You see the jaw muscles working in his hollow cheeks. Finally, he speaks with reluctance:{/n} "I need time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari schweigt. Du siehst, wie die Kaumuskeln in seinen leeren Wangen arbeiten. Schließlich spricht er zögerlich:{/n} "Ich brauche Zeit."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋陷入了沉默，你看到他凹陷脸颊上的颚肌在不断抽动。到最后，他不情愿地开了口。{/n}“我需要点时间。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari stays silent. You see the jaw muscles working in his hollow cheeks. Finally, he speaks with reluctance:{/n} "I need time."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋陷入了沉默，你看到他凹陷脸颊上的颚肌在不断抽动。到最后，他不情愿地开了口。{/n}“我需要点时间。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari reste coi. Les muscles de sa mâchoire se contractent sous ses joues creuses. Il maugrée enfin du bout des lèvres :{/n} « Il me faut du temps. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari stays silent. You see the jaw muscles working in his hollow cheeks. Finally, he speaks with reluctance:{/n} "I need time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari reste coi. Les muscles de sa mâchoire se contractent sous ses joues creuses. Il maugrée enfin du bout des lèvres :{/n} « Il me faut du temps. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari guarda silencio. Ves que mueve los maxilares en sus mejillas. Después, habla a regañadientes:{/n} «Necesito tiempo».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari stays silent. You see the jaw muscles working in his hollow cheeks. Finally, he speaks with reluctance:{/n} "I need time."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari guarda silencio. Ves que mueve los maxilares en sus mejillas. Después, habla a regañadientes:{/n} «Necesito tiempo».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}デュカーリは黙ったままでいる。窪んだ頬の筋肉がピクピクと動いているのが見えた。最後になって、彼はしぶしぶ口を開いた。{/n}「時間がほしい」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari stays silent. You see the jaw muscles working in his hollow cheeks. Finally, he speaks with reluctance:{/n} "I need time."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリは黙ったままでいる。窪んだ頬の筋肉がピクピクと動いているのが見えた。最後になって、彼はしぶしぶ口を開いた。{/n}「時間がほしい」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Drukhari sessizce duruyor. Çukur yanaklarındaki çene kaslarının çalıştığını görebiliyorsun. Sonunda isteksiz bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Zamana ihtiyacım var."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari stays silent. You see the jaw muscles working in his hollow cheeks. Finally, he speaks with reluctance:{/n} "I need time."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
